definition: hulusi, aka cucurbit flute (a kind of free reed wind instrument)
silk/thread/trace/(cuisine) shreds or julienne strips/CL:條|条[tiao2]/classifier: a thread (of cloud, smoke etc), a bit, an iota, a hint (of sth) etc

sentences.english: From Shenzhen, like to play flute and cucurbit flute.
sentences.chinese: 來自深圳，愛好長笛，葫蘆絲演奏。

sentences.english: From Chenxi County, like to play bamboo flute and cucurbit flute.
sentences.chinese: 來自辰溪縣，愛好笛子和葫蘆絲演奏。

sentences.english: Founded in 2000, specializing in the production Hulusi Yunnan and other folk instruments.
sentences.chinese: 成立於2000年，專業生產葫蘆絲等雲南民族樂器。

sentences.english: Like to play flute and cucurbit flute.
sentences.chinese: 來自貴陽，愛好長笛和葫蘆絲演奏。

sentences.english: The pure music chosen today is a melody performed by the Hulusi (a Traditional Chinese instrument), named Wang Chun Feng (A sight of the spring breeze).
sentences.chinese: 今天的純音樂，我選的是葫蘆絲版的《望春風》。

sentences.english: Like to play flute, bamboo flute and cucurbit flute.
sentences.chinese: 愛好長笛，竹笛，葫蘆絲演奏。

sentences.english: I am good at playing Hulusi, also I love music and art.
sentences.chinese: 我的特長是吹奏葫蘆絲，愛好是音樂，美術。

sentences.english: From lingbao , to be good at flute and cucurbit flute.
sentences.chinese: 來自靈寶市，擅長長笛葫蘆絲。

sentences.english: The young man explained, the bottle gourd silk is the United States of America Sax.
sentences.chinese: 年輕人解釋說，這個葫蘆絲就是美國的薩克斯。

sentences.english: Mix in the zucchini and chopped chocolate until well-combined.
sentences.chinese: 接着加入西葫蘆絲和巧克力，拌勻。

sentences.english: The old man laughed, shook her head again, said saxbe Hulusi mostly.
sentences.chinese: 老頭大笑，再次搖頭，說薩克斯比葫蘆絲大多了。

definition: to notate music/to write a score
in perfect harmony/in sync/lit. qin and se sing in harmony
lit. dragon soaring and tiger leaping (idiom)/fig. prosperous and bustling/vigorous and active
ukulele/simplified form also written 尤克里里琴
